speaker: RUTLAND
text:

              ,

text:
Chaplain
              ,
               
              away

text:
As
               
              for
               
              the

              of
               
              this
               
              accursèd
               
              duke
              ,

text:
Whose

text:

              ,

text:
Soldiers

              away

text:

              ,

              ,
               
              murder
               
              not
               
              this

              child
              ,

text:
Lest
               
              thou
               
              be

              both
               
              of
               
              God

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
How
               
              now
              ?

              dead
               
              already
              ?
               
              Or

              it
               
              fear

text:
That

              him
               
              close
               
              his
               
              eyes
              ?
               
              I’ll
               
              open
               
              them
              .

speaker: RUTLAND
text:
So
               
              looks
               
              the

              o’er
               
              the

text:
That

text:

              o’er
               
              his

              ;

speaker: RUTLAND
text:
And
               
              so

              to

              his
               
              limbs
               
              asunder
              .

speaker: RUTLAND
text:
Ah
              ,
               
              gentle
               
              Clifford
              ,
               
              kill
               
              me
               
              with
               
              thy
               
              sword

speaker: RUTLAND
text:
And
               
              not
               
              with
               
              such

              cruel

              look
              .

speaker: RUTLAND
text:
Sweet
               
              Clifford
              ,

              before

text:
I

              a

              for

text:

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
In
               
              vain
               
              thou
               
              speak’st
              ,
               
              poor

              .
               
              My
               
              father’s
               
              blood

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Hath

              thy

speaker: RUTLAND
text:
Then

text:
He

              ,

              with

              .

text:
Had
               
              I
               
              thy

              here

Were

              for

              ,

The
               
              sight
               
              of

              of

              of

Is

text:
Therefore
              —

Such

              as

              me

Thy
               
              father

              .

Thou

              ;

              in

Di
